resources.string: Are you sure you want to turn on Full Protection Mode?
Are you sure you want to turn off Full Protection Mode?
Please help me, I\'m in danger! My location is:
By turning Full Protection Mode on:
Please turn on your location service and allow SheSafe to access your location
SheSafe will automatically send a message to your emergency contacts when we detect a danger situation (scream, phone not moving, and too many phone shake)
SheSafe will give you a notification containing shortcut to call the police or your emergency contacts
Please make sure you have your phone with you at all times and bring your personal self-defense items
SheSafe will then send messages to them when you are detected to be in danger.
